title: NIPGR Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Senior Research Fellow Post
description: The National Institute of Plant Genome Research (NIPGR) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.E/ M.Tech, M.Sc, and Post Graduation can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the NIGPR Recruitment 2025 .
